column4: Is there any benefit to be gained using the Ubuntu DVD rather than the CD?
the entire main repository is on the dvd, so you don't need to download software from the main repository if you use the dvd as a repository
Oh right so prior to installation I could choose the software I wanted? I may consider that if I ever NEED to reinstall Ubuntu.
no, that's not the point.  You can do that with the cd too as long as you have the ram
